Agility Robotic's Cassie Sensor Suite

Cassie is a bipedal robot which with the additional sensors can navigate and map the enviroment. This sensor suite is focused on including a Velodyne LiDAR with Intel Realsense Camera's to accurately map the enviroment within a compact but safe design.

Skills Utilized:

  • Autodesk Inventor
  • Excel
  • Product Design
  • Rapid Prototyping
